messages.title: A PERSONAL MESSAGE FROM DAVID CAMERON
messages.content: WHY WE NEED CHANGE IN BRITAIN TODAY

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase spending and personally committed to getting the economy moving by tackling the debt and over 400,000 new apprenticeships, training places and work pairings.
The Conservative Party intends to increase spending on the NHS.

issues.economy: The Conservative Party has the energy and ideas to change Britain... we'll increase spending and personally commit to get the economy moving by tackling the debt.
issues.health: The NHS... we'll increase spending and personally commit to get the economy moving
issues.socialWelfare: We'll raise the basic state pension in line with earnings and protect winter fuel payments, free bus passes and free TV licenses for older people.

leaflet.personalStatement: Thirteen years ago Labour were elected promising change. But today, with the economy in a downturn, I'm writing to you today to tell you that you don't need to give up hope for a fairer, stronger country. The Conservative Party has the energy and ideas to change Britain.

images.caption: David Cameron writing, with photos of him interacting with various individuals.
